::Shadow Wing::

She runs out of the entrance and starts shooting with her optic 
lazars.  She fires on Pyro and Serpentor. 

Takes a quick look around for Dark One.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> Serpentor let out a loud hiss as a laser bolt stabbed into him, 
> gushing out mech-fluid.  Transforming to robot mode, the wound 
wasn't 
> as bad.  Raising his plasma rifle, he fired off a blt at Lunaprime.
